### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(62.0, -54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0))

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### Iron plate production
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0))
-  Offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))
-  Boiler (position (111.5, -32.0))
-  Generator (position (117.5, -30.5))
-  PipeGroup (fluid_system=133211, fluid=water position=(107.5, -34.5))
-  PipeGroup (fluid_system=133214, fluid=steam position=(117.5, -34.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when out of fuel
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions defined by the agent
- Important variables:
  - transport-belt: 8
  - small-electric-pole: 1
  - wood: 7
  - copper-ore: 80
  - iron-plate: 592
  - copper-plate: 5
  - copper-cable: 2
  - iron-gear-wheel: 2
